name: react-native-epub-json-monorepo
description: EPUB to React Native converter monorepo with WASM build tools

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:wasm: cd packages/react-native-epub-json-rust && rm -rf pkg && wasm-pack build --target nodejs && mkdir -p ../react-native-epub-json/src/lib && rsync -a --exclude 'package.json' --exclude '.gitignore' pkg/ ../react-native-epub-json/src/lib/

author: jingjing2222
